Class Description
API
This class provides APIs and methods for connecting to APIs of banks
App  
BankMessage  
BankResponse  
Bike  
BikeInDockHandler
This is the class handler for bike in dock screen
BikeInformationScreenHandler
This class creates a handler for getting customer's behaviors on the bike information screen
BikeToReturnHandler
This is the class handler for bike in dock screen
BikeTracker
A bike tracker keep information about a bike's rental.
Configs
This class provides constants, literals and related functions for generation to use in classes
Configs.BIKE_STATUS  
Configs.BikeType  
Configs.TransactionType  
CreditCard
This is the class for object entity Credit card including all information of a card
DBUtils
This class provides methods for connecting to the database, query information and do needed modifications
Dock
This is the class for object entity Dock including all information of the dock
DockForReturnHandler
This is the class handler for bike in dock screen
DockInformationScreenHandler
This class creates a handler for getting behaviors of customer on dock information screen
EBike
A bike with 2 wheels and an electric engine This bike will have the rental price as 1.5 times as the normal bike
EcoBikeBaseController
This is the base class for all controller used in the EcoBike subsystems (including the Information subsystem and RentBikeService subsystem)
EcoBikeBaseScreenHandler
This class is the base for all screen handler class of the EcoBike application
EcoBikeException
Exceptions occurs in Ecobike classes (does not includes the interbank side)
EcoBikeInformationController
This class is in charge of getting information from the database and returns it to the screen handler for displaying
EcoBikeMainScreenHandler
This class creates a handler for displaying the map and getting customer's activities on the main screen
EcoBikeUndefinedException
Undefined exceptions on the Ecobike side
FunctionalUtils
This class provides functions for helping processes in classes
InterbankBoundary
This class implements functions for performing transactions on the bank side
InterbankController
This is the controller for performing transaction on the bank side
InterbankException
Exceptions on the interbank side
@author chauntm
InterbankInterface
This interface provides functions that the interbank subsystem must be implemented for its communication with other subsystem Any interbank must implement this interface as a loose connection between the subsystems
InterbankUndefinedException  
InternalServerException  
InvalidCardException
This is class exception for case invalid card.
InvalidEcoBikeInformationException  
InvalidEcoBikeInformationException.ECOBIKE_INFORMATION_ERROR_CODE  
InvalidResponseException  
InvalidTransactionAmountException  
Invoice
An invoice saves information about transactions performed on a rental, including the bike rented, ID of the rental, transactions for the rental, and some other information related to the rental
InvoiceScreenHandler
This is the class handler for invoice screen
JSONUtils
This class provides functions for handling JSON objects and strings to use in communication between controllers and screen handlers, as well as between subsystems if needed
NoInformationException
Exceptions when EcoBike application cannot retrieve bike or dock information
NormalBike
A normal bike, with 2 wheels and no engine This bike will have a standard rental price
NotEnoughBalanceException  
NotEnoughInformationException  
PayForDepositScreenHandler
This is the class handler for deposit screen
PayForRentScreenHandler
This is the class handler for paying rental screen
PaymentScreenHandler
This class provides a base for all payment screen handlers
PaymentTransaction
A record of a transaction, including ID of the transaction, credit card number of the card performing the transaction, amount of money transfered, and details about the transaction.
PopupScreen
This is the class hanlder for pop up screen.
RefreshAccountMessage  
RefreshAccountResponse  
RentBikeController
This class handles rent bike, return bike and pause bike rental request from customers
RentBikeException
Exceptions occurs during the renting, returning or pause bike rental process
RentBikeException.RENT_BIKE_ERROR_CODE  
RentBikeServiceBoundary
This class is a real communicator of the rent bike subsystem
RentBikeServiceInterface
This interface allow communication between the information subsystem and the rent bike service subsystem Any rent bike service must implement this interface as a loose connection between the subsystems
SelectBikeToReturnScreenHandler
This class creates a handler for getting customer's behaviors on the bike information screen
SelectDockToReturnBikeScreenHandler
This class creates a handler for getting customer's behaviors on the bike information screen
SplashScreenHandler
This class spawns a handler for the first splash screen of the EcoBike application
SuspectTransactionException  
TimeCounter
A time counter is in charge of recording the start time, end time, as well as returning the time a bike is rented
TransactionMessage  
TransactionResponse  
VersionMissingException
